nodes.bodyText: I'm a bit confused that these lines are not covered by tests. Is this a bug? 😅

We don't need this code anymore because PUSH_PROMISE is disabled by default.
I left it in case that a certain server does not respect SETTINGS_ENABLE_PUSH disable well, but it would be better to revert these lines.
By the way, the quality of Codecov report is pretty good. 😀
